attributes.action: Reclassify Cannabis to a Class C Drug
attributes.additional_details: On 26th January 2009 cannabis was reclassified from a class C drug to a class B drug. It's time to make a change!
attributes.background:
If the government is not happy to legalise cannabis, I think a debate is needed to gather thoughts on reclassifying cannabis to a lower class, as plenty of evidence has been shown that it is less harmful
than most drugs it is classified with.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106726

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
